ygData.subject: Re: We're off to see the Wizard! this aint Kansas Dorothy!
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh Zardos, my poor Elven sparring partner. When will you realise that you Elves are not the most enlightened race? Your intellect, although undoubtably
ygData.messageBody:
Oh Zardos, my poor Elven sparring partner.

When will you realise that you Elves are not the most enlightened race?

Your intellect, although undoubtably superior to most, will not compare to
weakest of Erudite brains.

Please my friend, prepare yourself for a humbling experience when you enter
our land. There is a guard at the port who has forgotten more knowledge
that you'll ever know. It will just get worse for you from there my friend.

You will find me in and around the city of Erudin. Alas, I fell foul of the
local heavy yesterday night, and I have lost a sizeable some of monies. My
quest for adventure will have to go on hold for a while. (OOC: Not only
that, it's taking forever to level, so I'm too weak to travel as yet)

I look forward to seeing you in person my friend. I will be glad to offer
my shoulder for you to cry on when the truth hits.

Itan the Whistler
